Description: This is a full-time on-site position located in Kuwait City for an Artistic Gymnastics Coach. The coach will be responsible for creating, organizing, and leading gymnastics classes and training sessions for students from elementary to high school levels. The coach will collaborate with other coaches, staff, and parents to ensure a safe and positive learning environment. The coach will also monitor students' progress and make necessary adjustments to training routines and techniques, prepare students for competitions, and provide feedback to students and parents.Skills
Skills: Bachelor's degree in Physical Education, Sports Science, or a related field
• Certification as an Artistic Gymnastics Coach or related certification
• Experience coaching gymnastics at the elementary and high school levels
• Strong communication skills with the ability to interact effectively with students, parents, and staff
• Ability to adapt training techniques to different age groups, skill levels, and personalities
• Ability to create a fun and positive learning environment while maintaining discipline and safety
• Strong organizational skills with the ability to plan and execute training sessions, competitions, and events
• Willingness to work flexible hours including evenings and weekends as required
• Fluency in English is required, proficiency in Arabic is a plus
